ovdesc.p: This module is necessary because the automatic generation facilities available within the T24 core routines are not available for security codes of the format 999999-000. It is only used (at present) for incrementing security codes during an Exbond Build of the bonds database. Account builds are handled via the standard methods to generate the next account number.

desc.p: Describes the file name of this record.
3-35 type A (alphanumeric) characters. Multilanguage field. (Mandatory input.)
The file name which is to have sequential IDs automatically generated.
The input must be the name or abbreviation of a file of type H, U or L.
This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
The next sequential key for a new record for this file
The valid format for the key of the specified file. (Mandatory input on creation, not amendable!)
Must be in the same format as the ID for the specified file name. Existing IDs are not allowed.
